sentences.sentence: Russia claims to have foiled a three-pronged Ukrainian naval drone attack against the key bridge linking Moscow-occupied Crimea to the Russian mainland.

sentences.sentence: Violent protests broke out Saturday between Eritrean asylum seekers and Israeli police in Tel Aviv, with police shooting three people.

sentences.sentence: Protesters in Berlin hold a day rave on a busy nightclub street in the east of the city as a counter charge to government plans to expand a highway in the German capital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia's defense ministry claims to have foiled Ukrainian naval drone attacks on a key bridge over the Kerch Strait.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The bridge links Russia to Moscow-annexed Crimea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It said on Saturday morning the bridge was closed temporarily for the third time in a year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Russian military report claimed one naval drone was destroyed late on Friday and two others early on Saturday morning.

sentences.sentence: An explosion in October, which Russian authorities said was caused by a truck bomb, left three people dead.

sentences.sentence: A further attack on the bridge in July, which killed a couple and seriously wounded their daughter, left a span of the roadway hanging perilously.

sentences.sentence: The Russian Defense Ministry also said two Ukrainian drones were intercepted in its Belgorod region bordering Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Violent protests broke out Saturday between Eritrean asylum seekers and Israeli police in Tel Aviv during a protest against an organized event by the Eritrean embassy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Israeli police said at least three protesters were shot by police firing after they felt, quote, real dangers to their lives. Around 114 people have been injured in total, eight are in a serious condition, and at least 30 of the wounded are police officers. Eritreans make up the majority of the more than 30,000 African asylum seekers in Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: India successfully launched its first space mission to study the sun on Saturday, less than two weeks after a successful uncrewed landing near the south polar region of the moon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Aditya L1 spacecraft took off on board a satellite launch vehicle from southern India on a quest to study the sun from a point about 1.5 million kilometres from Earth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The satellite is scheduled to take 125 days to reach the L1 point that affords an uninterrupted view of the sun.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Over 5,000 people demonstrated on a Berlin street known for its many nightclubs and threatened with closures by the government's ambition to continue expanding the A100 city highway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The plan is to extend the motorway in the east of Friedrichshain in the direction of Lichtenberg. We're right in within a climate crisis at the moment. We don't need more cars, more highways.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Berlin does have pretty good public transportation, right?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We don't need any more cars and we don't need more highways going right through the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The pre-match build-up was all about Karim Benzema and Neymar, with the latter not featuring tonight due to injury.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But it was Aleksandr Mitrovic who stole the show with a brilliant hat-trick, including one of the best volleys you're likely to see all season.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Saudi Pro League has shaken up football with some really high-profile signings, not least Cristiano Ronaldo, who began the revolution at the back end of last year.
